cause.description:
Established in 1978, United Palestinian Appeal, Inc. (UPA) is dedicated to providing aid to Palestinians in the West Bank, Gaza Strip, and Palestinian refugee camps in Lebanon.
UPA provides both emergency humanitarian relief and long-term development programs to Palestinian communities striving for opportunity in the wake of ongoing conflict.
UPA maintains its independence and integrity as a strictly humanitarian organization by not accepting funds from political groups or from any source that may attach unacceptable conditions to its contributions.
UPA has been rated a "4-Star Charity" by Charity Navigator. UPA is also a member of the Independent Charities of America (ICA) and a participating member of the Combined Federal Campaign (CFC #11346).
cause.mission: Works to alleviate the suffering of Palestinians and to contribute to the long-term socioeconomic and cultural development of Palestinian society.
cause.name: United Palestinian Appeal
